title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.51 - Disabled vehicles subject to removal at operators risk and expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.51 - Disabled vehicles subject to removal at operators risk and expense

State Regulations

Disabled vehicles, other than the vehicles of a carrier
parked in berth space exclusively licensed to such carrier, may be removed to
another location at the truck terminal by the Port Authority, or, at the option
of the Port Authority, parked, garaged or stored elsewhere at the risk and
expense of the operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
